interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: NIRA Skincare Laser & Serum Bundle - Includes Anti-Aging Laser & Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles - FDA Cleared Review Date: 2021/05/18 Store: Nira Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Nira'} Review Text: Wow, I really like this beauty gadget!!
I really think it’s working!
It says use 90days or more for best result so
I’ll have to wait and update review but
I feel it’s really working.
I never used laser at home so I was scared but it’s super easy to use and take little time!
I’m still scared to try other than level 1 but even level 1, I do feel warmth and tiny bit pinch feeling.
I believe this gadget is for crow feet but I have small line on my forehead so I’ve been treating that area as well.(if it’s safe for around eye, it’s safe for forehead I hope....)
I like that this is FDA cleared as well.
I’ll update review after 90 days but so far so good!!! Review Title: I really think it’s working! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hand Crafted Ceramic Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser,100ml Fragrant Room Sprays Ultrasonic Aroma Mist Atomizer BPA-Free, Waterless Auto Shut-Off and 7 Color Night Lights for Office Home Study Yoga BRNBW {'Brand': 'BRNBW', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Special Feature': 'Multiple Light Setting, Automatic Shut Off', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 6.3 inches; 1.12 Pounds', 'UPC': '665059186312'} I have a similar diffuser but the cover is plastic, this one is ceramic and it feels and looks so much nicer!
I have another diffuser in bed room and love it so much, wanted to get another one for kitchen.

Ultrasonic aroma diffuser is so much better than candle and room spray in my opinion.
I don't like candle makes fuse and burning smell afterward.
Room spray is overpowering smell at first and doesn't last too long.
On the other hand, diffuser doesn't make fuse,burning smell and smells evenly from begging to end.
This is 100ml size and you think it's small and for only bed room but we live in 2600+ sqft , oepn floor house and when I use this in kitchen, I can still smell in my living room! (I think our ceiling fan help as well.)
This is really great addition for bedroom, living room or entryway!
Lighting is therapeutic at night too!
Totally recommend!! Love it BANILA CO Hi Bye Soothing Spot Treatment, 7 Natural Ingredients, Dermatologist-tested, Acne, Daily protection,30ml BANILA CO {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.09 x 1.34 x 1.3 inches; 3.63 Ounces'} It did actually make my pimple a bit smaller next day but what I didn't like was exp date.
All Korean skin care have 2.5 years expiration date from manufacture date. It is Korean law to print exp date or manufacture date on skin care products and makeup products.(Makeup products have 3 years instead of 2.5 years.)
Product I receive is April 2021 exp date, that is only 10 month away and that means this was manufactured on Dec 2018, that sound pretty old as it is June 2020 right now....
Yes it is not expired but I have been using many korean skin care brands and almost always I get the products that have at least 2 years or longer exp date.
This is not something you use every day like toner and I only have 10 month to use and there's no way that I can use whole bottle by April.
I think it's good product but hopefully you'd get longer exp date product than mine so you wouldn't waste your money! Wish I received longer exp date.... WeChip 666 WeChip {'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 3.23 x 2.32 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '726972070413'} This is my new beauty gadget!!!
This is amazing!
I knew how great and work the ultrasonic cleaner is because my husband got me a ultrasonic jewelry cleaner years ago and I’ve been loving it ever since.
It really amazes you to see how it can clean your jewelries without any soap and I even use for my glasses.
So when I start to seeing skin scrubber on SNS, I had no doubt that it would work.
And it really did!!! It is amazing!
It makes my skin so clean and soft with just water!! You don’t need to use peeling mask/pads or mud mask to clean your pores!
This is really great beauty gadget and it’s super reasonable!!!!! My new beauty gadget!! [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs) Abib {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'} This mask is way too thick and heavy for my taste.
I love korean masks and have been using goodal, dr jart, mediheal, dewycell, huxley, SNP, neogen, dermal and many more brands and this was the worst!
It's way too thick cream and doesn't absorb at all.
After you take the mask off, your face is completely covered with WHITE cream.
I had to wipe off everything!
I really don't uderstand this mask.
Too bad as I love abib Yuja essence and was hoping this would be good but no.
Packaging is simple and good though but that's all to me. I did not like this mask Dr.Althea Multi-Action Infusion Serum - 56 Packets of Light weight Gel Serum Dr.Althea {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Dr.Althea', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Protein,Calluses,Anti-aging', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5.7 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} I love these are individually packaged so every time you open, it's fresh and very hygienic.
One packet have generous amount of serum in it and you can use not only for your face but also your neck
and hand. or you can use one packet in the morning and at night, I'd say one packet is for 2 times use instead of once.
It's gel watery feeling serum and not oily or sticky at all which I love.
It makes my skin very hydrate, calm and it doesn't bother even if you wear makeup afterwards.
Overall, I really love this serum and recommend! Hygienic packet EASYDEW Starter Moist Whip Foam 5.07 fl oz - Non-Drying, Gentle & Purifying Foaming Cleanser with Ceramide I Exfoliating Daily Face Wash that Removes Dirts and Makeup EASYDEW {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily to combination skin, Normal to dry skin, Sensitive to acne-prone skin', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Scent': 'Light floral', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '2.28 x 1.81 x 7.01 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmax'} I've been using Easydew products for a while and every products works on my skin really well!
Their pricing is reasonable but yet effective!
This cleanser is generous size and last for a while.
I have sensitive skin but it didn't cause any irritation or redness so that's good.
I just started using it so I'll update the review in a month or so! Love Easydew EASYDEW DW-EGF Double Synergy Moist Ampoule1.01 fl oz -K Beauty Award-Winning Anti Aging Ampoule with EGF to Plump, Moisturize Skin I For Sensitive Skin, Gift for Mom, Wife, Her EASYDEW {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '4.29 x 1.54 x 1.46 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Easydew is a very popular skincare products not only in Korea but also in Japan.
Easydew was created by Korean dermatologist and EasydewEX which is green packaging are only available at dermatologist office.(But you can still find some of the products on Amazon.)
I've been using Easydew ampoule, cleansing foam and moisturizer for a while and love them all.
I wanted to try something new and picked this up.
This really heelp during cold dry winter time and moisturize my skin really well.
It's not oily or sticky at all which I love.
I have sensitive skin but this didn't cause any irritation or redness.
I just started using it so I'll update the review in a month or so but so far it's great ampoule!

Easydew DW-EGF Love Easydew MEDIHEAL LINE FRIENDS Collagen Impact Essential Mask EX. (Collagen Mask 8 Sheet + 8 Synergy Sheet) - Double Firming & Lifting Synergy with Line Friends Layered Sheet Mediheal {'Brand': 'Mediheal', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Lifting', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '8.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.25 x 4.5 x 1.6 inches; 10.41 Ounces'} I use Line app so I'm familiar to these characters and these collabo face mask are SO cute!!!
I love mediheal face mask and have been using for years.
I think Mediheal face mask is the most famous face mask in Korea.
I love their NMF, ipi, HDP, DNA, tea tree and ofcourse these collagen.
Price is reasonable, I never had any skin problem with mediheal mask and trust their brand 100%.
I use mediheal mask every other day and am totally recommend!!! Love Mediheal!! Easydew EX Repair Control Renewal Moisture 1.70 fl.oz. EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 2.87 x 2.52 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} I love Easydew and have been using their cleanser, ampoule and efg cream for a while and love this cream as well but the cream I received expire in just 4 month!
All other easydew products I got last year(2020) won’t expire until 2023!
Korean skincare have 3 years expiration date since manufactured date so all other easydew products I got last year was manufactured on 2020(same year I got) and pretty fresh but this cream is expired in 4 month that means this was made back in 2018....
Yes, it’s not expired yet but getting 2018 products when it’s 2021 seems kind of bummer.
I only use this cream when my skin feel sensitive or had trouble like pimple and etc and I don’t use everyday but now I feel I have to as it’ll expire in 4 months!
Check the date when you receive! Check expiration date. Mine expire in 4 months. NIRA Skincare Laser & Serum Bundle - Includes Anti-Aging Laser & Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles - FDA Cleared Nira {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Nira'} Wow, I really like this beauty gadget!!
I really think it’s working!
It says use 90days or more for best result so
I’ll have to wait and update review but
I feel it’s really working.
I never used laser at home so I was scared but it’s super easy to use and take little time!
I’m still scared to try other than level 1 but even level 1, I do feel warmth and tiny bit pinch feeling.
I believe this gadget is for crow feet but I have small line on my forehead so I’ve been treating that area as well.(if it’s safe for around eye, it’s safe for forehead I hope....)
I like that this is FDA cleared as well.
I’ll update review after 90 days but so far so good!!! I really think it’s working!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has a strong preference for ceramic materials over plastic, focusing on aesthetics and quality in home decor and beauty gadgets that integrate innovative design with functionality.

- **Aromatherapy Enthusiast:** They favor ultrasonic aroma diffusers for subtle scents and cleanliness, steering clear of traditional candles and room sprays.

- **Functional Design:** Key features like automatic shut-off and versatility are essential, particularly for their large living space (over 2600 sqft).

- **Therapeutic Elements:** The user values wellness benefits from aromatherapy and lighting, striving for a relaxing home atmosphere.

- **Skincare Commitment:** They are dedicated to effective skincare tools that enhance skin health without harsh chemicals. The user is particularly engaged with hydrating products for sensitive skin and frequently uses sheet masks, reflecting familiarity with reputable brands, particularly in the K-beauty sector.

- **Critical Engagement:** Discerning in their skincare choices, the user prefers high-performance, safe products, especially due to past negative experiences related to quality and freshness.

- **Recent Positive Engagement:** A recent purchase highlights their openness to utilizing innovative beauty gadgets focused on anti-aging, indicating a balance of effective skincare with engaging technology. Their enthusiasm suggests a willingness to invest in devices that offer convenience and results, especially those that are FDA cleared.

- **Quality Concerns:** Their previous dissatisfaction with product expiration dates emphasizes the importance of freshness and product integrity in their skincare routine.
